Name: Chocolate & Cranberry 'Martini'
Ingredients: 15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Coat glass rim with chocolate powder and sugar (moisten with orange juice).
Review: The chocolate rim sounds naff, but it makes this cocktail.
History: Created in 2003 by yours truly in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Chocolate & Cranberry 'Martini' contains 184 calories
